channel.title: Web on A Dive in Eldon's Mind
channel.description: Recent content in Web on A Dive in Eldon's Mind

item.title: Build a Website in 30 Minutes with Hugo
item.description: If you ever want to build a static website like a personal blog, project page or technology documentation, what approach will you take to generate it? Think about it, what if you can set up, build, deploy the website within 30 minutes when it looks beatufiful and feels modern? Use a static website generator!

item.title: Big Ideas of Web Development
item.description:
Website is just so interesting and important to the world nowadays, and I believe it is becoming more and more interesting and important every second.

So let’s talk about my understanding of web development; I want to explain the fundamental concepts in my way, Eldon’s way so that someone without experience would understand :p
